name: Clin M Vulva
title: Clinical M
notes:
**Note:** When both the Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and metastatic detail are available, use the metastatic detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage - see Registrar notes.
* If the only information is FIGO III [NOS], IIIA, IIIB, IIIC, or  IVA, assign the appropriate stage and leave clinical T, N, and M blank. If the only information is FIGO stage IVB, leave T and N blank and see M

**Distant lymph nodes**

    External iliac
    Internal iliac (hypogastric)
       Obturator
    Pelvic, NOS
